thread.title: Kilian

author: Kilian
title: Kilian
text: This was so easy, there was great choice of cars, Martin from the chat service walked me through it and gave me 5% discount which allowed me to get a better car for the same price my the original cheaper option, they even agreed to drop off and pick up the car from the hotel which is in a nice area in the styx of Sao Miguel, Azores, (for a small price of course)
